Amazing Villa For Sale In Ubud/USD200,000

http://raywhiteparadise.com/villa/amazing-villa-for-sale-in-ubud.html



This is a very well priced brand new 3 bedrooms villa located just 10 minutes from the center of Ubud. Amazing rice field views this brilliant architecture design utilizes the surroundings to it’s full potential.

Villa Anumay

This Twin Villa of Yamuna is designed as a Holiday Home and rests adjacent to

Villa Yamuna.

With 3 en-suite Bedrooms, Anumay is generously allocated on over 600 sqm of lush gardens. With its contemporary design rounded of by a fine selection of Indonesian decorative pieces and antiques, providing local timbre to the modern setting.

Sharing the architectural concept with Villa Yamuna this Home features 186.4 Sq.mt. Of living and entertaining spaces, dining terrace with amazing views over Rice fields, forested coves and the Bedugul mountain range.

Three Bedrooms, two en-suite bathrooms & guest bathroom, Gazebo,7.0 by 2.8 meter Pool, provide stylish living space for 6 Persons. Two bedrooms have build in relaxation alcoves to rest and accommodate younger children. With its carport,2 private gated entrances, tropical gardens, terraced pool decks.

Villa Anumay is concepted to provide luxury comfort and intimate spaces
yana@raywhiteparadise.com / 08179747593

Luxury Villa Complex Retreat in Ubud /USD265.000

http://raywhiteparadise.com/for-sale/luxury-villa-complex-retreat-in-ubud.html



Ushers a return to tranquility and indulgence with its tropical water features

and it’s exquisitely appointed 4 Bedrooms, En-suite bathroom, Dining Vista & Lounge terrace.

The in and out door spaces,45sqm Forest Pavilion with its Meditation Deck offer seclusion and refined comfort for 8 Persons, the large Suite bedrooms feature Day bed Niches to rest and accommodate younger children. A fully fitted Kitchen and pantry was designed to provide meals for 10 persons or more. Villa Yamuna’s taste fully furbished spaces compromising 2740 Sq. Feet of stylish covered living space, on 950 sqm land with a Carport for 2 Vehicles,2 private gated

entrances, pool-gazebo, and a 7.50 by 2.80 swimming pool promise a high return for owner since we have provided also Operating-Licenses allowing LEGAL Villa-Holiday-Rental(Pondok Wisata)

yana@raywhiteparadise.com / 08179747593

Amazing Villa on 26.6 ARE Heart of Seminyak/usd790.000

http://raywhiteparadise.com/villa/holiday-villa-rental/amazing-villa-on-26-6-are-heart-of-seminyak.html#contact



PRICE REDUCED NEARLY 20% !!!!!! AMAZING BUYING IN THIS LOCATION

HEART OF SEMINYAK!!! (Next to “THE LAYAR”)

Unbelievable property in the heart of Seminyak on 26.6 ARE – often sort seldom found.

Three separate Villas A/B/C with own kitchen / lounge / family room plus two bedrooms – if you are looking for Balinese style on a large piece of valuable real estate this is the one!!

Only 5 minutes walking distance…Jl. Oberoi (Eat Street), with all the restaurants, spa and the best shopping area! Perfect! And the beach…very near as well – do not miss out!!

Different options: you can obtain all 3 villas and the 26.6 ARE or you can just take – Villa A separated from Villa B+Villa C. I have drawings I can forward if interested. This gives you a lower priced option to still be able to live in Luxury with all the benefits of an amazing location!! Seminyak is the place to be!

Please contact me re the different price options. These are extremely attractive!!

The main bathroom has it’s own plunge pool!!!

If you are looking to rent this Oasis – three well separated villas on a large plot – great value!!

The view: Villa A, garden. Villa B and Villa C, garden + pool.

A must view for people looking in this area – you could easily put your own touches to this piece of paradise.

13 years leasehold (till 2025) plus 10 year extension, in the contract at market price – $975,000 USD NOW ONLY!!!!!!! $790,000 USD – extremely motivated vendor – he wants the property moved!~!

Also there is a 38 year leasehold option available until (2050) – $2.145.000 US NOW ONLY $1,950,000 USD!!!

Call today to view or for more information.

shane@raywhiteparadise.com – +6281338276772

Amazing Property Unbelievable ROI Seminyak!!/USD1,950,000

http://raywhiteparadise.com/villa/villa-for-sale-villa/amazing-property-unbelievable-roi-seminyak.html#contact



INVEST NOW AND WATCH THE MONEY ROLL IN

The Villa’s are located in what is now considered Seminyak’s prime district, home to some of the classiest properties on the island.

Walking distance to internationally acclaimed restaurants such as Ku De Ta, La Lucciola, Hu’u Bar, and to a variety of designer boutiques and art galleries.

Just 300 meters from the sweeping Oberoi beach, famous for its world-class surf breaks, panoramic coastline views, and legendary sunsets.

Residence is made up of 3 villas.
Villa 1. – The main house of the property, with 3 bedrooms, ensuites, private pool
Villa 2. – 2 bedrooms at the centre of the property, with ensuites, private pool
Villa 3. – Another 3 bedroom villa, at the end of the complex, with ensuites, private pool

All with private entrances and private pools, the villas can be booked separately or combined to create an expansive 8 bedroom private complex. An easy to use, sliding door separates each villa from the other, ensuring complete privacy.

In it’s first year of operation it had a 72% occupancy rate – took over 1200 USD a day and netted over 314,000 USD!!!

Leasehold 28 years plus a 20 year extension available.

FACILITIES In Operation Now:

Each Villa has the following:

Welcome drink and cold towel upon arrival
Breakfast daily
Complimentary airport transfers
Air-conditioning in all bedrooms
English speaking staff
Fully equipped modern kitchen
Security service
Wifi internet connection
Cable TV in all bedrooms
Safety deposit boxes in all villas
Private pool

Services available at an additional charge

Laundry and dry cleaning service
Use of a car and driver
Babysitting available on request
Scoopy Burberry Scooters
In house menu

For further information or to arrange a viewing please call or email Shane: +6281338276772 shane@raywhiteparadise.com

A Superb 3 Bedroom Villa in Jimbaran/USD399,000

http://raywhiteparadise.com/villa/villa-for-sale-villa/a-superb-3-bedroom-villa-in-jimbaran.html#contact



Properties in a complex like this do not come along often! A superb 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom villa in a secure community with an amazing size swimming pool, all in a great location in Jimbaran hill and close to the beach and its famous seafood restaurants! A must view if you are a serious buyer.

Off the master bedroom there is a large bathroom with a huge hand made bath – There is a 4th room being the maid’s room. Yes there is more – a large fully fitted kitchen.

Very close to the famous “FOUR SEASONS”!!

Call or email me today to not miss out!

Very Nice 4 Bedroom Villa in Canggu/Sale Price : USD525,000

http://raywhiteparadise.com/villa/villa-for-sale-villa/very-nice-4-bedroom-villa-in-canggu.html#contact



This villa is tucked away down a rustic lane beside the Canggu river just 100 meters from the beach and the Balinese fishing village at Canggu and close Canggu’s famous surf break, just a 5 minute ride to the famous Beach House restaurant at Echo beach. With the upcoming Sea entosa also taking place in this area, this region is sure to appreciate rapidly and will be home to a host of high end retail outlets.

As dawn breaks, the small traditional boat houses native to the area come alive awash with fresh produce which can be prepared by yourself or cooked to perfection just the way you like it. Or lay in bed listening to the sound of the ocean waves breaking!

This property is a great purchase whether for permanent residence or as a holiday home maximizing on superb ROI potential for the remainder of the year, or with the option for dividing the property with one double bedroom boasting its own entrance and plunge pool. The property is already in possesion of Pondok Wisata licensing. Besides the main swimming pool there is three separate plunge pools.

At this price the property just won’t be on the market long – contact me ASAP!!!!

Call today to view or email for more information.

Villa Project Near The Beach of Seseh Seminyak/USD419000



http://raywhiteparadise.com/commercial/villa-project-near-the-beach-of-seseh-seminyak.html

A villa project located near the beach of Seseh only 25 minutes away from Seminiak the heart of Seminyak.

THE VENDOR IS VERY MOTIVATED!!!!!!!

27 ara with 36 years lease remaining with building at 70 % = Us $ 529.000

10 Ara land plot 36 years lease US $ 139.000

Freehold options

The land is of 27 ara in Seseh beach with ocean view from second floor Villa

The title was originally 40 years lease hold (36 years left now)and the villa is at 70% build

( 600m2 with 3 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms )

The land owner is available to transform the title in freehold

Sale price in freehold 995,000 Us $ ( with villa as it is now not finish )

To complete the villa with an extra 2 bedroom will require 190.000 us $

Call or email me for more information .
yana@raywhiteparadise.com

Breath Taking Sunsets Rice Fields Canggu

http://raywhiteparadise.com/villa/breath-taking-sunsets-rice-fields-canggu.html



Individually designed, this villa provides breathtaking panoramic views of themselves with a view of four mountains in the late afternoon and the terraced paddy field. All material for the villa specially selected for a specific reason to give you the best experience. Terrace on 2nd floor overlooking a vast expanse of rice fields around the area of Canggu. Our pool villas with large private pool has a nice open plan design to make your perfect holiday. In addition, enjoy and relax in one of the swimming pool in our villa, sipping your favorite cocktail.

Villa designed by highly reputable Balinese architect : Komang Suardika. Jeghier from JEGHIER ARCITHECT firm. His Special roof feature design make this villa looks amazing and unique.

Buy to live in or run as a business – the options are all there.

IMB IS IN PROCESS – we have a form stating this – not sure how long it will take but obviously an agreed amount of money can be held back until this certificate is processed.

3 YEAR RENTAL AVAILABLE

Also there is a 5 year option to rent the villa for 220,000,000 IDR per year – 3 years = 660,000,000 IDR – very reasonable considering the stunning location and brand new property!!! On our website it is in USD (24,000) per year at the exchange rate today = $72,000 USD for the 3 years. The best value rental in the area.

5 Bedrooms Villa With Amasing Rice Filed Views in Umalas

http://raywhiteparadise.com/villa/villa-for-sale-villa/5-bedrooms-villa-with-amasing-rice-filed-views-in-umalas.html

Untuk bahasa Indonesia chek dibawah

This magical villa built in Balinese style is a must view for the person looking for a great location in the Umalas.

A stunning rice field view that is seldom found this close to the city nowadays!

One of the bedrooms is set away from the main house next to the pool – perfect for the family with older kids that want a bit of space.

The villa sits on 29 ARE of land that backs onto the surrounding rice fields.

A must view for the serious buyer looking for a bargain with an extension available.

Call or email me now to view or for more information in English.

shane@raywhiteparadise.com or +62 813 382 76 772

Bahasa

Sebuah villa yang asri dengan pemandangan sawah ,dengan luas tanah 29 are ,dengan kolam renang yang besar ,sebuah investasi yang bagus karna villa ini terletak sangat strategis untuk tinggal ataupun untuk disewakan kembali , villa ini terhubung dengan dengan 2 villa lainnya yang dimana salah satu diantaranya juga dijual ,tergantung anda untuk membeli salah satunya ataupun keduanya .villa ini harga sewa 15 tahun Euro 240.000

Untuk informasi lebih lanjut dalam bahasa Indonesia hubungi

yana@raywhiteparadise.com or +62 817 974 75 93

A Nice 3 Bedrooms Villa in Umalas With Naturally Environment

http://raywhiteparadise.com/villa/villa-for-sale-villa/a-nice-3-bedrooms-villa-in-umalas-with-naturally-environment.html

[PRIVATE – 11.3 ARE – Hak Pakai / Hak Milik (can be converted to)

The villa is perfectly located in Jalan Bumbak, Umalas. The area is a vibrant tourist area and is close to everything – only 10 minutes to Seminyak, 10 minutes to Canggu Club and 25 minutes to Ngurah Rai International Airport.

This villa offers a modern tropical living, set on 1130 sqm of land, build by Balinese modern architecture. This villa combines both open living spaces enclosed areas with AC or naturally spacious environment. The villa comprises of three bedrooms. The kitchen, living room, dinning room view to the garden and swimming pool.

There is also a very large separate building that would be great as an indoor entertainment area / rumpus room or you could convert it into two additional bedrooms.

This villa has a Pondok Wisata permit so it can be legally rented out daily, weekly, monthly or yearly!

A great villa for a family to live and relax in – it is very private or one could purchase as an investment to rent out.photo]49037171[/photo]

The Stunning 2 Bedrooms Apartment In Nusa Dua

WOW!! The view is stunning. Right on the beach and all the water sports imaginable at your doorstep. This near new 200sqm two level apartment is a must to view. Fully furnished with Western design and all home comforts. Hurry the vendor is motivated to sell.

This apartment block has four units of which 3 have already been sold.

The new (already started to be built) roadway from Sanur will increase the market value dramatically due to much easier access to the area.

This apartment is in full possession of IMB (building permit) and Pondok Wisata license, allowing these units to be legally rented on a daily, weekly or long term basis. This Apartment has a leasehold title until 2055 which can be extended.
yana@raywhiteparadise.com / 08179747593
